name: Space Trucker
blurb: Space Trucker, an exciting new vision of humanity\u2019s future in space from an award winning team of game development veterans.

rewards.reward: No Reward

INTERN (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nJust five dollars buys our eternal love and gratitude, plus a lot more! You receive access to our backer forums where you can share your ideas and weigh in on important Space Trucker design decisions. Your name will be listed in the credits under \u2018Supporter\u2019 and you will receive your personalized nickel access card via .PDF file.

CONTRACTOR (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nOn the day of the official launch you will receive the Space Trucker game via digital download or Steam key. You will also get the digital making-of book, game soundtrack, and a collection of high quality game art files to adorn your desktop!  (+ all previous rewards)

QUALITY ANALYST \u2013 EARLY BIRD! (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nGet a leg up on your competition by gaining early access to the Space Trucker beta program before the game is released! Plus you can scope out the best trade routes on the digital map of the solar system that details all the stations, outposts and bases in the final game.  (+ all previous rewards)

QUALITY ANALYST (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nGet a leg up on your competition by gaining early access to the Space Trucker beta program before the game is released! Plus you can scope out the best trade routes on the digital map of the solar system that details all the stations, outposts and bases in the final game.  (+ all previous rewards)

LEAD STRATEGIST \u2013 EARLY BIRD! (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nBe one of the very first to glimpse the world of Space Trucker by being a part of the alpha program. Help us shape the final product into something amazing! You also walk away with the official strategy guide to take your monopoly of the space lanes to a whole new level. (+ all previous rewards)

LEAD STRATEGIST (Digital)\r\n============================= \r\nBe one of the very first to glimpse the world of Space Trucker by being a part of the alpha program. Help us shape the final product into something amazing! You also walk away with the official strategy guide to take your monopoly of the space lanes to a whole new level. (+ all previous rewards)

MANAGER\r\n============================= \r\nTake your contribution to the next level and walk away with some sweet swag! Hang your poster size print of the world map on your wall for easy reference. Sport your Space Trucker t-shirt to show you\u2019re a true fan. Flash your personalized bronze access card for that extra bit of respect. Lumbergh can\u2019t hold a candle to you! (+ all previous rewards)

GENERAL MANAGER\r\n============================= \r\nTake Space Trucker with you wherever you go with a customized USB drive containing the final version of the game. Plus receive the impressive Poster Pack containing three large size prints of breathtaking images from the game guaranteed to be 10 times more inspirational than your typical office motivational poster. (+ all previous rewards)

DEPARTMENT HEAD\r\n============================= \r\nAs a department head you\u2019re used to being recognized. Now be immortalized by lending your name to a hirable crewmember inside Space Trucker! If you want your name to be something epic like Derek Lazor who are we to judge? (+ all previous rewards)

DIRECTOR \u2013 EARLY BIRD!\r\n============================= \r\nUpgrade your access to the exclusive Designer Forums where our developers are interested in your opinions and thoughts on all sorts of major game development decisions. Plus get exclusive insight into the game design process that you can find nowhere else. You\u2019ll also be receiving the set of very attractive hard cover Making-of and Art of Space Trucker books for your coffee table. Not to mention your personalized silver access card! (+ all previous rewards)

DIRECTOR\r\n============================= \r\nUpgrade your access to the exclusive Designer Forums where our developers are interested in your opinions and thoughts on all sorts of major game development decisions. Plus get exclusive insight into the game design process that you can find nowhere else. You\u2019ll also be receiving the set of very attractive hard cover Making-of and Art of Space Trucker books for your coffee table. Not to mention your personalized silver access card! (+ all previous rewards)

MANAGING DIRECTOR\r\n============================= \r\nEvery trucker needs a hat, and you\u2019ll be getting a damn fine one! Sporting the Space Trucker mission patch on the front you\u2019ll be looking extra cool as you cruise the space highways. (+ all previous rewards)

VICE PRESIDENT\r\n============================= \r\nTake home an exclusive piece of collectable history with your very own signed concept art print. Suitable for framing and hanging in your office or the executive washroom. Chill out to a CD of the game\u2019s soundtrack and revel in your elite status with your gold personalized access card. (+ all previous rewards)

SENIOR VICE PRESIDENT\r\n============================= \r\nNot content to just name an in game crewmember? Why not become one? Using a photo you provide our artists will render your likeness onto the crewmember of your choice. You name him or her yourself, write the bio and determine their starting stats, all so you can achieve digital immortality! And now that you\u2019re truly \u201cin the game\u201d you should be wearing the official crew hoodie, so we\u2019ll send you one! (+ all previous rewards)

EXECUTIVE VICE PRESIDENT\r\n============================= \r\nRare and exclusive define the Executive Vice President, that\u2019s why at this level you will be receiving a one-of-a-kind, high quality, signed and numbered lithograph print depicting a stunning in game scene either rendered or hand drawn. This item is only for our Kickstarter backers and will never be available again! (+ all previous rewards)

CFO\r\n============================= \r\nRub shoulders with the major decision makers in the Producer Forums. Watch your personalized titanium access card open all the right doors for you. And proudly display your high quality, hand painted ship model on your giant mahogany desk*. You\u2019ve reached the C-level baby and the sky\u2019s no longer the limit! (+ all previous rewards) (*giant mahogany desk not included)

CTO\r\n============================= \r\nMake your mark on Space Trucker and all who play it! Work with one of our artists and developers to design one of the in game space stations! You will decide how it looks, what it\u2019s named, who put it there and why, what it produces and what it needs to survive. Plus you will receive an exclusive credit as a \u2018Contributing Designer\u2019 in the game!  (+ all previous rewards)

CEO\r\n============================= \r\nMost ships in Space Trucker are endlessly customizable, but a rare few are dedicated to doing a specific job and doing it VERY well. Ships such as the luxury cruise liner for tourist transport, or the gargantuan fuel tanker. As a \u2018Contributing Designer\u2019 you will make one of these specialty ships your very own by working with our artists to define its look, name it and write it\u2019s history. Every future player will long for the day they can afford your amazing creation! (+ all previous rewards excluding Design a Station)

BOARD MEMBER \u2013 PARTY \u2013 EARLY BIRD!\r\n============================= \r\nNot only will you acquire the coveted platinum personalized access card, you will be invited to the official Space Trucker release party in Malta! Party with the devs, tour the Space Shark offices, explore the island and luxuriate in your five star accommodations. All provided by us! When that\u2019s done you will take home with you a specially commissioned Space Trucker themed oil painting to remember us by. (+ all previous rewards excluding Design a Ship) (*You must provide your own travel arrangements)

BOARD MEMBER \u2013 PARTY\r\n============================= \r\nNot only will you acquire the coveted platinum personalized access card, you will be invited to the official Space Trucker release party in Malta! Party with the devs, tour the Space Shark offices, explore the island and luxuriate in your five star accommodations. All provided by us! When that\u2019s done you will take home with you a specially commissioned Space Trucker themed oil painting to remember us by. (+ all previous rewards excluding Design a Ship) (*You must provide your own travel arrangements)

BOARD MEMBER \u2013 DESIGNER\r\n============================= \r\nNot only will you acquire the coveted platinum personalized access card, you will be invited to Malta to join the development team for a day! Tour the Space Shark offices, explore the island and luxuriate in your five star accommodations. All provided by us! Then work with our designers to create WHATEVER YOU WANT! A special ship or station, maybe a specific game feature or story event. It\u2019s up to you, within reason of course. When that\u2019s done you will take home with you a specially commissioned Space Trucker themed oil painting to remember us by. (+ all previous rewards excluding release party) (*You must provide your own travel arrangements)

CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD\r\n============================= \r\nGot a special itch you want scratched? Maybe you feel what happened to Pluto was appalling and you want to see its planet status reinstated and design the station that orbits it. Perhaps you have the perfect name for a new moon of Jupiter or a minor planet. Whatever your compulsion, we\u2019re here to help. All special requests will be considered. So get in contact and we\u2019ll discuss it. Once that\u2019s done you will of course be invited to the release party and take your place among the honored space diehards who made this game a reality. (+ all previous rewards) (*You must provide your own travel arrangements)
